𒋽 gur8 "curve" ≈ circle 𒄥 gur "curve" => gyro 𒃵 gur2 "curve" => krumm

𒋽 gur₈ ≈ 𒉢 šir ша́рик šárik зирх zirx ǧir 𓌨 𓂋 𓅱 | testicles | ყვერი q̇veri чуурга çuurga circle : bulb

𒋽 uru₅ ru₁₀ •round in 𒋽 ᵍuru₅ •gyro 𒋽 •ᑫvru quiver reflex in 𒈥𒋽 mar-ru₁₀ 𒂍𒈥𒋽 e₂mar-ru₁₀ 𒀀𒈠𒊒 a-ma-ru 𒀀𒈣𒊒 a-ma₂ru emarru "quiver"

𒋽 ≈ 𒆠 ≈ 𓊖 in 𒋽 uru₅ ≈ 𒌷 URU ≈ 𒆠 ≈ 𓊖 dwelling; seat 𓊨
